nodes.text: Mother Vima was a starship from the planet Grizmallt. Around 3900 BBY, during a brutal civil war on Grizmalt, Queen Elsinoré den Tasia's sponsored the colony ship Beneficent Tasia and its two support ships, Mother Vima and Constant, on an offworld expedition.

Mother Vima, along with its two sister starships—Constant and Beneficent Tasia, the latter of which was the supported vessel—was a part of an expedition fleet led by the Republic explorer Kwilaan that in 3951 BBY discovered a star system located in the southern quadrant of the galaxy that became known as the Naboo system, after the Grizmallt deity Nabu.
In the French edition of the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, the database entry pertaining to the Naboo society called the ship Mother Sunrider rather than Mother Vima.

In Star Wars Legends, Vima Sunrider was a Jedi active around the time of the Great Sith War who took on Meetra Surik as her informal Padawan learner. The year after Mother Vima's fleet found Naboo was also the year the Sith Civil War ended, which allowed for the Galactic Republic to reclaim territories lost to the Sith since the Great Sith War, and the same year Meetra Surik departed for the Unknown Regions in search of Revan.
